content: 2 stitches from the left hand needle then knit the 2 stitches on the cable needle video links c4b https //youtu be/bjly6leqlts c4f https //youtu be/9wp0a-sr38e t4b https //youtu be/rzhhbv2hzwy t4f https //youtu be/-kmwnbysnnc 💫 tip when doing the cables and twists in this pattern you can verify that you are knitting and purling as you should by making sure that you always knit the knits and purl the purls as they appear #disturbanceintheforcesocks page 3 of 12 marie-elyse dugal designs 💫 note the right and left leg are mirror images of each other therefore the instructions differ in two main ways the cables are on the exterior part of the leg and foot and the cables flow in opposite directions please make sure that you read to the end of the pattern and make the 2 different halves of this project and that you use the chart for the correct foot right sock instructions note that the charts for the patterns repeats can be found at the end of all instructions co 56 64 72 stitches using your preferred method such as long tail or german twisted separate stitches equally in two 28 32 36 st per needle if using magic loop or as needed if using another method right cabled cuff joining in the round place bor marker and begin cable rib as follows round 1 *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of round round 2 *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of round round 3 *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of round round 4 *p4 c4f repeat from * to end of round repeat round 1 to 4 another 3 times 4 times in all for 16 rounds total left cabled cuff joining in the round place bor marker and begin cable rib as follows round 1 p4 0 4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last 4 0 4 stitches k4 0 4 round 2 p4 0 4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last 4 0 4 stitches k4 0 4 round 3 p4 0 4 *k4 p4 repeat from * to last 4 0 4 stitches k4 0 4 round 4 p4 0 4 *c4b p4 repeat from * to last 4 0 4 stitches k4 0 4 repeat round 1 to 4 another 3 times 4 times in all for 16 rounds total #disturbanceintheforcesocks page 4 of 12 marie-elyse dugal designs alternate cuff right cuff round 1 *p4 k4 repeat from * to end of round repeat this round 15 more times for a total of 16 rounds left cuff round 1 *k4 p4 repeat from * to end of round repeat this round 15 more times for a total of 16 rounds right leg the force flowing motif charts for each size are at the end of the written instructions round 1 pm/sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 pm/sm knit to end of round round 2 sm p4 k4 p4 k4 p4 sm knit to end of round
